item.title: CVE-2023-30969|2024-09-10T16:40:49.878Z -- palantir -- com.palantir.tiles%3Atiles
item.description: The Palantir Tiles1 service was found to be vulnerable to an API wide issue where the service was not performing authentication/authorization on all the endpoints.
